definitions.definition: Any member of the extinct order † Belemnitida of Mesozoic marine cephalopods , very similar in many ways to the modern squid and closely related to the modern cuttlefish .

main_definition: ( paleontology ) Any member of the extinct order † Belemnitida of Mesozoic marine cephalopods , very similar in many ways to the modern squid and closely related to the modern cuttlefish .
